mapper.select: select u.nickname nickname, c.name city, ct.name communityType, cm.* from community cm left outer join user u on cm.u_id = u.u_id left outer join city c on cm.c_id = c.c_id left outer join community_type ct on cm.cm_type_id = ct.cm_type_id order by register_date desc
